title: The Obscure Game That Cursed My Friend

media:group.media:title: The Obscure Game That Cursed My Friend
media:group.media:description:
In today's episode of Strange Gaming Stories, we take a trip down memory lane and explore a true story of a kid and a game that changed his outlook on gaming forever. 


CREDITS:

MUSIC:

“Awkward Meeting” - Kevin MacLeod
“Meiyo” - Kaizen92
“Hidden Track” - Earthbound

VIDEO CREDIT:

Eric & Darrel
DroneWorldHD
